sentences.sentence: Some dinosaurs had only rudimentary teeth.
sentences.translation: 有些恐龙只有未充分长成的牙齿。

sentences.sentence: Birds are widely believed to have evolved from dinosaurs.
sentences.translation: 鸟类普遍被认为是从恐龙进化而来的。

sentences.sentence: It has been suggested that mammals took over from dinosaurs 65 million years ago.
sentences.translation: 有人提出哺乳动物是在6 500万年前取代恐龙的。
